title: Micro-X (MicroXP and Micro2003) Multi Boot CD - eXPerience
description:
Micro-X by eXPerience
 ---------------------

 MicroXP and Micro2003 Dual Boot CD
 ________________________________________________________________________

 Main boot menu:
 ---------------

 1 = MicroXP with Added Driverpacks.
 2 = MicroXP on its own. (103Mb ISO, 217Mb Windows Folder)

 3 = Micro2003 with Added Driverpacks.
 4 = Micro2003 on its own. (104Mb ISO, 219Mb Windows Folder)

 5 = Acronis Backup + Restore (Safe For Vista)
 6 = Windows XP - Live Bootable Environment
 7 = SpinRite v6.1 (Hard Disk Testing and Repair)
 8 = Windows Memory Diagnostics (RAM Memory Testing)

 ________________________________________________________________________

 There is now just one single Last Session.ini file for nLite and
 that one file can be used on both XP SP3 and Server 2003 SP2.

 ________________________________________________________________________

 Updated to October 2008
 -----------------------

 Both editions of Windows include Windows Updates to October 14th 2008.

 This also includes the out of cycle hotfix KB958644.

 This means Windows is updated to Monday November 10th 2008. The day
 after that, the next lot of updates come out if there are any.

 ________________________________________________________________________

 Drivers for Thousands of Devices Installed Automatically With Windows
 ---------------------------------------------------------------------

 Boot options #1 and #3 are with added driverpacks to support:

 Chipset
 CPU
 Ethernet
 Graphics Cards
 Mass Storage devices
 SATA Drives
 Sound Cards
 Wireless LAN

 In this new edition you can now actually cancel the extraction of
 certain packs as Windows is installing.

 ________________________________________________________________________

 Added Programs - Optional Installs
 ----------------------------------

 There is a folder on this CD called &#039;APPS&#039;.

 This is a menu with several programs where you can tick each box next
 to each program and have them all install one after the other without
 any user intervention.

 Includes Internet Explorer 7 and Windows Media Player 11.

 ________________________________________________________________________

 Create a Separate ISO File
 --------------------------

 Look in the ISO folder, each BAT file makes an ISO of any of the
 4 main options.

 ________________________________________________________________________

 eXPerience Desktop Folder
 -------------------------

 Contains many useful tools and solutions, quick shortcuts to get to
 things on first installation like changing your keyboard layout and
 so on.

 _____________________________________________________________________

 Full Details
 ------------

 This is only a short explanation, please download the small zip
 file included in the torrent, it explains everything. You do not
 need to download the full release to find out the info, just
 deselect the ISO file in your torrent client if you only want
 to find out what it is all about.

 _____________________________________________________________________

 Don&#039;t forget to join SnipeR&#039;s Redemption Network:

 <a href=" http://www.retestrak.nl/Board/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.retestrak.nl/Board/</a>

 _____________________________________________________________________

 ISO File MD5 Checksum:

 CE7C93D084ADE6B018D419273C31F550

 _____________________________________________________________________

 Enjoy this fine release from eXPerience

 Release Date: November 1st 2008

 _____________________________________________________________________
